description: The JSON output produced by mkvmerge's file identification mode
title: mkvmerge identification output

___attachments.description: an array describing the attachments found if any

___multiplexed_tracks.description: An array of track IDs indicating which tracks were originally multiplexed within the same track in the source file

___program_number.description: A unique number identifying a set of tracks that belong together; used e.g. in DVB for multiplexing multiple stations within a single transport stream

___minimum_timestamp.description: The minimum timestamp in nanoseconds of all the frames of this track found within the first couple of seconds of the file

___supported.description: States whether or not mkvmerge can read the format

___type.description: A human-readable description/name for the container format

___properties.description: additional properties for the container varying by container format

___container_type.description: A unique number identifying the container type that's supposed to stay constant over all future releases of MKVToolNix

___playlist_size.description: The total size in bytes of all files referenced by the playlist if it is a one

___is_providing_timecodes.description: States whether or not the container has timestamps for the packets (e.g. Matroska, MP4) or not (e.g. SRT, MP3)

___playlist_file.description: An array of file names the playlist contains

___next_segment_uid.description: A hexadecimal string of the next segment's UID (only for Matroska files)

___playlist_duration.description: The total duration in nanoseconds of all files referenced by the playlist if it is a one

___other_file.description: An array of names of additional files processed as well

___date_local.description: The muxing date in ISO 8601 format (in local time zone)

___previous_segment_uid.description: A hexadecimal string of the previous segment's UID (only for Matroska files)

___date_utc.description: The muxing date in ISO 8601 format (in UTC)

___segment_uid.description: A hexadecimal string of the segment's UID (only for Matroska files)

___programs.description: A container describing multiple programs multiplexed into the source file, e.g. multiple programs in one DVB transport stream

___service_name.description: The name of a service provided by this program, e.g. a TV channel name such as 'arte HD'

___program_number.description: A unique number identifying a set of tracks that belong together; used e.g. in DVB for multiplexing multiple stations within a single transport stream

___service_provider.description: The name of the provider of the service provided by this program, e.g. a TV station name such as 'ARD'

___playlist_chapters.description: The number of chapters in a playlist if it is a one

___playlist.description: States whether or not the identified file is a playlist (e.g. MPLS) referring to several other files

___muxing_application.description: A Unicode string containing the name and possibly version of the low-level library or application that created the file

___writing_application.description: A Unicode string containing the name and possibly version of the high-level application that created the file

___recognized.description: States whether or not mkvmerge knows about the format
